name: Lem_Krarr
content: Lem Krarr was a Human male criminal during the early years of the New Republic. Krarr had a substantial bounty on his head, totaling ten thousand alive and six thousand dead. In 13 ABY, Kir Kanos tracked down Krarr and delivered him to the authorities alive. After being informed that Krarr was wanted for murdering fourteen younglings, Kanos killed him and took the lesser payout.
